test-case.name: should turn the input field blue when focused
test-case.title: should turn the input field blue when focused

failure.message: input[name='name'] should have blue border when focused.: expected 'rgb(0, 0, 255)' to equal 'rgb(221, 221, 221)'

test-case.name: should turn required fields red if form submission fails
